H0.text: In the water were the organisms that first appeared on Earth.

H1.text: In the air, organisms lived when they first appeared on Earth.

H2.text: On the land, organisms lived when they first appeared on Earth.

H3.text: Under the ground was where organisms lived when they first appeared on Earth.

A4.text: Earlier cells might have had a leaky membrane and been powered by a naturally occurring proton gradient near a deep-sea white smoker hydrothermal vent.

A5.text: Life may have originated inside the continental crust.

A6.text: RNA world, early in the history of terrestrial life

A7.text: Ediacaran period, early in the history of terrestrial life
